<h1 align="center">
  ITense Blog
</h1>

Blog with fantasy stories, alogithms and programming languages learning topics and fewmore things. Everything made by me from sratch using Gatsby.js as Front-end and Strapi as Content Managment System.

## ğŸš€ Quick start

Download repository and install node_modules in folloeing way.

````shell
git clone https://github.com/Hooded22/IT-in-society-blog.git
npm install
````
Next start development mode like this:

```shell
npm start
````
## ğŸ’» Ready works reasult ##

Blog is hosting and works in web. You can find this on the link:  
https://itense.netlify.app/
